content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step instructions to build it.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure has 5 distinct blocks
- It consists of 4 layers
- From bottom to top:
  * Bottom layer: Two blocks - one blue cube and one orange cube side by side
  * Second layer: One red block with a curved opening
  * Third layer: One green rectangular block
  * Top layer: One orange triangular roof piece

Required blocks from the dictionary and assembly order:

{
Step1: Move block with index 6 (blue cube, left bottom)
Step2: Move block with index 7 (orange cube, right bottom)
Step3: Move block with index 3 (red block with curved opening)
Step4: Move block with index 10 (green horizontal rectangular block)
Step5: Move block with index 14 (orange triangular roof piece)
}

The assembly builds up from bottom to top, ensuring stability. Each block is used in its exact orientation as shown in the dictionary without any rotation needed. The curved opening in the red block faces forward, the green rectangular block sits horizontally across the top of the red block, and the orange triangular piece sits centered on top of the green block to complete the structure.
